data.name: Speed and Scream
data.detailed_description:
High-adrenaline experiences collection for virtual reality, actually containing 4 rides:

Bloody Mists
Visit the realm of the dead and experience it's loneliness

Warp Drive
See how fast can you go, on the moon surface with low gravity, no air resistance. Can you reach warp speeds?

Fall out
This facility once produced electricity for nearby town, now is all but devoid of life and purpose.

Traveller
Visit distant worlds where you laws of physics doesn't apply, with a V8 powered hovercraft.
